attributes.action: Do not give Tony Blair a knighthood or any other honour
attributes.additional_details: Honours should go to deserving people who have served their communities and country. Not to someone who led the UK in to a war on false information that cost countless lives
attributes.background: The Queen’s honours list should not be used to honour ex politicians just because they became prime minister.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions about honours or appointments, including requests for individuals to be given or not given particular honours.
